description:
Oman's Supreme Committee and Muscat Municipality and the Ministry of Regional Municipalities and Water Resources (MRWR) have decided to close all industrial and commercial activities in light industrial areas in Muscat on April 10. On June 9, these businesses were allowed to reopen: 

Key shops, shoe stores, shoe repair and jewelry stores, Gold and silver, natural medicines and herbs, transaction tracking offices,  photocopying shops, Car glass repair and selling shops, Installing decoration works, shops selling household utensils, trading of tailor supplies, buying and selling scrap, digital printing shops, calligraphy shops, paper and plastic industry, glass industry, photos and frames shops, car exhaust repair shops, car dealerships, vehicle paint shops, furniture shops, billing service collection office, luxury stores, clothes and sporting good stores, cosmetic stores, ready-made clothing stores, stores selling abayas and sheilas, shops selling Omani Masar and Al Kamim, children's clothing stores, artificial turf shops, shops selling perfume and incense, carpet washing shops, shops selling wallpaper, curtain shops, childrens' toy shops, pottery shops & factories, Shops selling antiques and gifts, shops selling leather bags and goods, carpet stores, trademark and patent registration offices, equipment rental shops, Communication companies' buildings, shops selling vehicle accessories, shops selling camel and equestrian supplies. Social distancing required.
enforcer: National Government,Other (Please specify in the text box)

description: On the 19th of August 2020, the Municipality of Muscat, Oman, they announced new guidelines for international restaurants. First, the restaurants should record the names and their details of the employees and guests when entering and leaving the restaurants. Second, the tables should have a distance of 2 meters between each table and the table should not have more than 4 people. Third, one time menus should be distributed for customers and customers are required to wear masks all time in the restaurants. Moreover, the municipality has set these standards and everyone should stick to it and report if any health violations health occur.
institution_status: This type of business  ("Restaurants") is allowed to open with conditions
enforcer: Municipal Government
